name: A Myriad Chariots, A Trial of Courage
desc: After any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, advances the ally target's action by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.
enhanced_desc: After any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, advances the ally target's action by 100% and increases their DMG dealt by 75%. The DMG Boost effect stacks up to 2 time(s) and lasts until they are attacked.
